name: Mega Candy: A Match-3 game
description:
Mega Candy is one of the best match-3 games you'll ever find in the market today! Match three or more of the sweet candy diamonds as fast as possible and be the candy champion!

Enter the candies world,smash the candies, collect the sweets, gently move the candies, relax yourself.
In this fantastic adventure,Maybe you can become a candy smasher heroes,control these candies crush,splash,blast,or move.

Play through 50 levels filled with creamy dreamy treats!
- Match 3 games filled with ice candy, sugar, free fall and sweet treats await!
- Adventure through hundreds of delectable fantasy levels
- Addicting frenzy games and mini games take you on the adventure of a lifetime!
- 100% mega candy free game to play and enjoy with fall in love

** How to play Mega Candy **

+ Switch and crush 3 candy or more sweet candy
+ Match 4 candy in a line to create lighting thunder
+ Match 5 candy with T or L shape to create bomb
+ Match 5 candy in a line to create color blossom
+ Combine 2 special cakes to make a big surprised yummy blast!
+ Collect candy contain gift time, double score
